CustomField.formula:
IF( Bid_Room_1_redirect__c ="", IF( Bid_Number_1__c = "" , "", HYPERLINK( "https://steria.sharepoint.com/sites/intra_sc_tilbud/" + Bid_Number_1__c + "/SitePages/Hjemmeside.aspx?Title=" + SUBSTITUTE( Account_Name__c + " - " + Stage_ID__c + " - " + Name, "&", "og"),
"https://steria.sharepoint.com/sites/intra_sc_tilbud/" + Bid_Number_1__c)), "Contents of Bid Room 1 is transferred to Bid Room " + LEFT(Bid_Room_1_redirect__c,1))
CustomField.label: Bid Room 1
